 Right now, he's trying to save the day,

(Chorus)

Who'd rather make the world a better place,

Now he's got more money than he knows what to do with,
And Bill Gates, he's not too far behind.

Chorus:
Jeff Bezos and Bill Gates, they'll never win,
I'm the one they've been looking for to dethrone,

In this rap battle, I'm going to prove it.

I work hard every day, just to keep the store lit,
But don't get it twisted, I'm a tech wizard too,

(Bill Gates)
I'm the king of the tech world,

But they're OK, because I always win.

But they can't take my place.
I'll keep on rapping, until my skills are on the decline,
Then I'll take a long vacation.

So here's to Microsoft and Amazon,

We'll see who comes out on top,
In this epic rap battle of epic proportions.
